name: @vevx/varp
description: Graph-aware project analysis and manifest-driven agent orchestration

scripts.build: bun build src/lib.ts --outdir build --target node --format esm --sourcemap=external --external fast-xml-parser --external zod && bun build src/mcp/index.ts --outdir build --target node --format esm --sourcemap=external --external @modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external zod && bun build src/cli/cli.ts --outdir dist --target bun
scripts.test:pure: bun test --concurrent src/scheduler/ src/plan/diff.test.ts src/plan/validator.test.ts src/plan/log-parser.test.ts src/enforcement/ src/analysis/co-change.test.ts src/analysis/hotspots.test.ts src/analysis/matrix.test.ts src/analysis/graph.test.ts src/manifest/render-graph.test.ts src/manifest/resolver.test.ts src/manifest/links.test.ts src/manifest/touches.test.ts src/shared/
scripts.check: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bun run lint:shell && bun run build
